field.name: summary
field.value: Enable XML documentation file generation in Visual Studio project properties

field.name: description
field.value: "XML Documentation File" field in [project properties] -> Configuration Properties -> Build should be set to corresponding documentation file that should be generated (Castle.DynamicProxy.xml). This also enables compile time warnings of bad documentation (missing comments etc). One another option is "Treat warnings as errors" to prevent developers from committing poorly documented code to version control ;-) Having this file in the same directory where referenced dll is enables VS intellisense too.
